name: NightDrift Doom
description:
Game developed during a game Jam in just 3 days.

Colaby with Gillenew

History

Earth has been invaded by bizarre creatures who disregard all as natural laws, distorting a reality and causing chaos. Grotesque and with disturbing ways of causing destruction, these creatures receive the end for humans.

Now seeing their imminent end, humans have launched the Luna project, which attempts to make the latest technology breakthrough as a last hope for survival.

Controls Keyboard:

Arrows keys: Move Luna/Menu navegation

Z: Shoot/Menu confirm

C: Shield ativate/deativate

Control Gamepad:

D-Pad or Left Analog: Move Luna/Menu navegation

X: Shoot/Menu confirm

Y: Shield activate/deactivate
